metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5731 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in examples/openid.php inphpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.16, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before4.6.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viavectors involving an OpenID error message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5731` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
